description: This table contains information about the providers who participated in the delivery.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OB_DEL_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider who was present at the delivery. This information is entered on the mother's chart in the Delivery Summary Activity. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: OB_DEL_PROV_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the role of a provider who was present during delivery. This column is entered on the mother's chart in the Delivery Summary Activity.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
